ygData.subject: Re: Chivtron Decisions
ygData.msgSnippet: Grounded smiled as an idea came to him.  No, we should have a alliance, but not with the alliance.  But with a faction that will protect us, because they are

Subject: Re: Chivtron Decisions

Grounded smiled as an idea came to him.  "No, we should have a 
alliance, but not with the alliance.  But with a faction that will 
protect us, because they are two honourable to let anything die, 
catch my drift everyone"

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Soulstice Omega" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> Perplex: Hey, put that thing away, we shouldn't draw any weapons 
inside of the base.
> 
> Sarge: Don't you see? The weapon is here because I think you might 
be trying to trick me. Maybe you're really with Deemos, and want to 
trap me here and kill me. Sorry about that, I don't really believe 
that, I just don't know what else to say.
> 
> Perplex: Maybe we should just offer to help the Chosen Mafia out in 
exchange for them not trying to hurt us.
> 
> Sarge: Are you out of your mind, boy? As soon as we have our backs 
turned Deemos will rip our sparks out through our eyes!
> 
> Arrow: I have to agree on this one. That's the stupidest idea I've 
ever heard. If we try to side with them, they'll just wait for the 
opportunity to kill us all. If that happens, I won't be here, because 
I will have already left. I don't want to die until I'm sure I've 
done everything I can to insure your safety, but if you want to 
condemn yourself, Perplex, how about YOU be the one who ask 
them? "Hi, Chosen Mafia, I'm Perplex, and I was wondering--" BANG! 
I'm sure we can get along without you Perplex, so go on. If that's 
what you want to do, ask them for an alliance.
> 
> Sarge: Well said, soldier.
> 
> Perplex: You're wrong, Arrow. I think that we can really side with 
their team the Alliance. It would mean joining the evil side, but we 
can be rid of their attacks forever.
> 
> Sarge: Boy, Deemos doesn't stop till he gets what he wants. If we 
side with the Alliance, then they'll kill us and walk off.
> 
> Perplex: What's wrong with you anyway?
> 
> Sarge: You don't know how tough my life's been, boy. You have no 
idea...
> 
>   ----- Original Message ----- 
>   From: Soulstice Omega 
>   To: nbwrpg@y... 
>   Sent: Saturday, June 30, 2001 9:23 PM
>   Subject: Re: Chivtron Decisions
> 
> 
>   Sarge drew his rifle.
> 
>   Sarge: Deemos is mine. I'm in charge here...
> 
>     ----- Original Message ----- 
>     From: gunthers8@n... 
>     To: nbwrpg@y... 
>     Sent: Saturday, June 30, 2001 6:58 PM
>     Subject: Re: Chivtron Decisions
> 
> 
> 
> 
>     Grounded thought hard for a bit. "All right, I announce now the 
death 
>     sentence on Deemos for crimes first and second degree murder.  
It is 
>     now, your duty to kill him, Aerotaur.  Not a savage grudge, but 
a law 
>     announced. We will not kill like ancient transformeres.  His so 
>     called, lackeys, also have a death sentence for protecting 
aiding a 
>     fellons escape.  Does this suit you both."
>     --- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
>     > Trinity::
>     > 
>     > "When wiull we started to train Uncle Aerotaur?????" said 
Trinity
>     > 
>     > --- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
>     > > ::Aerotaur::
>     > >     "I'm sorry Grounded but Deemos has hurt us too many 
times for 
>     > me to let 
>     > > him live.  This is all because I let him go the first time 
he 
>     > attacked.  As 
>     > > for you Sarge, I have just as much reason to kill him.  In 
our 
>     last 
>     > fight I 
>     > > lost an arm and a leg defending others.  I nearly died 
because 
>     > there were 
>     > > bots in the battle that shouldn't have been there.  I 
couldn't 
>     care 
>     > less 
>     > > about his lackeys.  Now then, let's get to the meeting so 
we can 
>     > finish it 
>     > > and start planning our attack."  He stands tall glaring at 
Sarge.
